public class

PhoneSysUiClient

extends Object
java.lang.Object
   ↳ com.google.android.apps.auto.sdk.vanagon.PhoneSysUiClient

Class Overview

Decorates Activity content view with the Android Auto system UI and forwards all Activity lifecycle methods to Android Auto to allow Android Auto to coordinate system states.

If Android Auto is not present, using this class to report Activity lifecycle has no effect.

Summary

Nested Classes
interface PhoneSysUiClient.AndroidAutoStateCallback Listens on the entering and exiting of Android Auto phone UI mode.

Constants

public static final int FACET_HOME

Facet type of home app.

Constant Value: 1 (0x00000001)

public static final int FACET_MAPS

Facet type of navigation app.

Constant Value: 4 (0x00000004)

public static final int FACET_MEDIA

Facet type of media app.

Constant Value: 2 (0x00000002)

public static final int FACET_OTHER

Facet type of other type of app, and this type is reserved for Android Auto system UI

Constant Value: 5 (0x00000005)

public static final int FACET_PHONE

Facet type of phone app.

Constant Value: 3 (0x00000003)

public static final int FACET_UNKNOWN

Unknown facet type.

Constant Value: 0 (0x00000000)

Public Constructors

public PhoneSysUiClient (Activity activity)

Parameters
activity Activity: the Activity to be decorated with Android Auto system UI.

Public Methods

public ViewGroup getActivityRootView ()

Gets the Activity root content view, which has an id of android.R.id.content.

Returns
ViewGroup the activity root view

public View getSystemRoot ()

Gets the root view of the Android Auto phone system UI. After calling onCreate(boolean), this view is the same as getActivityRootView().

Returns
View the system root view

public boolean isAndroidAutoRunning ()

Returns true if Android Auto is currently running.

Returns
boolean

public static boolean isAndroidAutoRunning (Context context)

Returns true if Android Auto is currently running.

Deprecated, use isAndroidAutoRunning() instead.

Parameters
context Context
Returns
boolean

public void onConfigurationChanged (Configuration newConfig)

Reports onConfigurationChanged(Configuration) event.

Parameters
newConfig Configuration: the new configuration to be applied

public ViewGroup onCreate (boolean enabled)

Reports onCreate(Bundle) lifecycle. Initially enables or disables Android Auto system UI at the same time.

Parameters
enabled boolean: true when Android Auto system UI is enabled
Returns
ViewGroup a ViewGroup where app can insert its UI

public void onDestroy ()

Reports onDestroy() lifecycle.

public void onPause ()

Reports onPause() lifecycle.

public void onResume ()

Reports onResume() lifecycle.

public void onStart ()

Reports onStart() lifecycle.

public void onStop ()

Reports onStop() lifecycle.

public void onWindowFocusChanged (boolean hasFocus)

Reports onWindowFocusChanged(boolean) event.

Parameters
hasFocus boolean: true if the window gets focus

public void setAndroidAutoStateListener (PhoneSysUiClient.AndroidAutoStateCallback listener)

Sets a listener to listen on the entering and exiting of Android Auto system UI. Set null to remove the registered listener.

The listener will not be synchronously called by this method.

Parameters
listener PhoneSysUiClient.AndroidAutoStateCallback: listens on Android Auto phone UI mode change

public void setEnabled (boolean enabled)

Enables or disables Android Auto to decorate the Activity with Android Auto system UI.

Parameters
enabled boolean: true if Android Auto system UI is enabled

public void setSystemUiVisibility (int flags)

Sets the visibility of the Android Auto phone system UI, such as navigation bar and status bar.

Parameters
flags int: the flags used to set the System UI visibility

See also:

  • SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_FULLSCREEN
  • SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_HIDE_NAVIGATION

public void setTintStatusBarIcons (boolean darkened)

Sets the status bar tint theme. For example, this should be called to darken the status bar icons when a light background is shown below them.

Parameters
darkened boolean: true if theme is set to darkened

public void showFacetNavigation (boolean showFacetNavigation)

Show facet navigation if showFacetNavigation is true, else show traditional system UI nav (home, back).

public void showFacetNavigation (boolean showFacetNavigation, int ownerFacet, int activeFacet)

Reports the type of the current Activity.

Parameters
showFacetNavigation boolean: deprecated parameter
ownerFacet int: id of facet that is hosting the control
activeFacet int: id of facet for which button will be active
